 = FREEBSD 切换WIFI源 Freebsd switch wifi source =
==== 扫描 scan ====
`ifconfig wlan0 up scan`
==== 切换 shift ====
`ifconfig wlan0 down`<br>
`ifconfig wlan0 ssid "EROS"`<br>
`ifconfig wlan0 up`<br>
